issue.title: [CF 353] Failed conditions as a color state
issue.body:
Maybe maybe? It needs to be optional if I do.

Also consider splitting up failed conditions, duration, and stacks. I don't really like that idea, though.

If you like the idea of a color state for failed conditions, please vote this ticket up.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #353 | Raw

comments.body:
I don't like it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
